channel.title: nodeit changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: v0.1.0
item.description: * Fixed dependency resolution for CodeMirror modes * Fix error caused by chromeTabs trying to close an already closed tab * Published API docs at http://alanshaw.github.io/nodeit/doc/ * [OSX] Fixed scrollbar issues * [OSX] Fixed app not opening window when opening files from finder * [OSX] Added Sparkle for auto updates * [OSX] Fixed opening non ASCII files issue
